meanings.sent1: She remained unwedded throughout her life.
meanings.sent2: The unwedded couple decided to adopt a pet together.
meanings.sent3: The unwedded princess had many suitors vying for her hand.
meanings.sent4: His unwedded status allowed him to focus on his career without distractions.
meanings.sent5: The unwedded man enjoyed the freedom of making decisions independently.

meanings.sent1: The unwedded woman lived happily on her own.
meanings.sent2: He felt content in his unwedded state.
meanings.sent3: The unwedded professor dedicated all his time to research.
meanings.sent4: Her unwedded status did not define her happiness.
meanings.sent5: They were both unwedded and enjoyed their independence.

meanings.sent1: The unwedded man was focused on his career.
meanings.sent2: She preferred being unwedded rather than in a relationship.
meanings.sent3: The unwedded traveler explored the world on his own.
meanings.sent4: Being unwedded allowed her to pursue her passions freely.
meanings.sent5: The unwedded artist found inspiration in solitude.
